org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser
Class BrowserLayer

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.canvas.AbstractLayer
      org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser.DomTextLayer
          org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser.BrowserLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Layer
public class BrowserLayer
extends DomTextLayer

An implementation of the Layer interface using the Safari/WHATWG Javascript CANVAS.

Author:
Ray Cromwell <ray@timepedia.org>

getScrollLeft

public int getScrollLeft()
Description copied from interface: Layer
a layer may be created bigger than its actual bounds, in which case there are hidden areas which are clipped. This returns the x coordinate of the upper left of the drawing surface relative to the visible bounds.
